Message:
I took a slight bow,
when I heard a voice
whispering to me.

“...Thank you.
This is what I’ve
always wanted to see.”

I look back and see that
young boy starting to fade,
till he finally vanished.
His smile never leaving his face.

Then, the elderly man
came to me with an
awkward look on his face,
and spoke to me.

“I apologize for my actions earlier.
I hate outsiders,
and I wasn’t in the best mood,
but your show really made my day.”
I finally put a smile on his face.

Soon after,
fireworks shoot into the sky,
soothing the spirits of the dead,
and bringing the festival to a close.

...I’ll do my best so the smiles
we see here don’t ever fade away.

So, make sure you come back
for some more fun, okay...?

Alright, time to get
my head back in the game...

Hey, all you kids, grandparents,
and everyone in between!
Come join me for some fun!

and leave with memories
that you’ll treasure forever!
